Dude, when this thing is up, I will definitely join
it!!
--- David Torrey <Dachande85@...> wrote:
> (Wow! All the people! Well, now I'm definitely gonna
> have to make one. It will take place on Cybertron's
> present, and I have no problems with transferring
> characters from NBW to NBM or back, so feel free to
> bring your characters, but don't abandon this great
> RPG!! BTW Magmatron is going to kinda take
> Megatron's place on Cybertron, he will get control
> of a large area of the planet, but not all. And the
> forces will be Maximal, Predacon, Destron, and
> Other)
> 
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     Upon returning to his base he decided to set up
> some charges in the mountain to move the ship. He
> sent robotics teams to plant these bombs.
>     "All Destron forces, return to base emidetally,"
> He commanded. "Minor explosives will be detonating
> shortly, I need to be closer to a ocean."
> 
> (This will also give a definite place for
> Magmatron's lair. I've also gotta make a Drake
> Magmatron figure, gotta get BM Megs for that)
>
